Original: Original
Dialogue: Dialogue

Original: Garnet:Why did I do that...?
Dialogue: Why did I do that...?

Original: Penelo:Are you alright, Garnet?
Dialogue: Are you alright, Garnet?

Original: Penelo:You look down... Did something happen?
Dialogue: You look down... Did something happen?

Original: Garnet:Did you hear thatZidane agreed to be Ultimecia's transient knight?
Dialogue: Did you hear that�Zidane agreed to be Ultimecia's transient knight?

Original: Penelo:Yeah, I did.
Dialogue: Yeah, I did.

Original: Penelo:I was surprised when I heard. Becoming a knight is something special, isn't it?
Dialogue: I was surprised when I heard. Becoming a knight is something special, isn't it?

Original: Penelo:I can imagine how upset you must have been since you and Zidane are so close...
Dialogue: I can imagine how upset you must have been since you and Zidane are so close...

Original: Garnet:No, that's not it.
Dialogue: No, that's not it.

Original: Garnet:Zidane was just being kind, and yet I got jealous... I regret getting so upset.
Dialogue: Zidane was just being kind, and yet I got jealous... I regret getting so upset.

Original: Garnet:I know I shouldn't blame my hardships on anyone or anything else, but...
Dialogue: I know I shouldn't blame my hardships on anyone or anything else, but...

Original: Rydia:I don't think you need to be so hard on yourself.
Dialogue: I don't think you need to be so hard on yourself.

Original: Garnet:Oh! Did you overhear us?
Dialogue: Oh! Did you overhear us?

Original: Rydia:Sorry. But we were worried about you...
Dialogue: Sorry. But we were worried about you...

Original: Fran:There's no need to fret if your heart remains unchanged.
Dialogue: There's no need to fret if your heart remains unchanged.

Original: Garnet:I believe in Zidane. But I can't sort out how I feel...
Dialogue: I believe in Zidane. But I can't sort out how I feel...

Original: Fran:Then why not get some distance?
Dialogue: Then why not get some distance?

Original: Fran:You two are too close. You cannot see the forest for the trees.
Dialogue: You two are too close. You cannot see the forest for the trees.

Original: Garnet:The forest...?
Dialogue: The forest...?

Original: Rydia:I think it's a great idea!
Dialogue: I think it's a great idea!

Original: Rydia:Take some time for yourself. I doubt your feelings will change at this point, after all!
Dialogue: Take some time for yourself. I doubt your feelings will change at this point, after all!

Original: Garnet:But still, I...
Dialogue: But still, I...

Original: Gabranth:How long have you been here?
Dialogue: How long have you been here?

Original: Rydia:Fran and I just arrived. But Garnet and Penelo were here already.
Dialogue: Fran and I just arrived. But Garnet and Penelo were here already.

Original: Garnet:Did something happen?
Dialogue: Did something happen?

Original: Gabranth:Have you seen Gau?
Dialogue: Have you seen Gau?

Original: Fran:We have not, and our departure nears.
Dialogue: We have not, and our departure nears.

Original: Gabranth:The boy was with me earlier, but I lost sight of him.
Dialogue: The boy was with me earlier, but I lost sight of him.

Original: Garnet:I'll help you find him!
Dialogue: I'll help you find him!

Original: Gabranth:Where did Gau run off to?
Dialogue: Where did Gau run off to?

Original: Garnet:He couldn't have gone far. If we split up, we should be able to find him.
Dialogue: He couldn't have gone far. If we split up, we should be able to find him.

Original: Gabranth:Thank you for your help.
Dialogue: Thank you for your help.

Original: Penelo:I'm worried about him...
Dialogue: I'm worried about him...

Original: Penelo:He may be free-spirited, but he wouldn't go off without a reason.
Dialogue: He may be free-spirited, but he wouldn't go off without a reason.

Original: Garnet:I hope he hasn't been captured by Kefka or the others...
Dialogue: I hope he hasn't been captured by Kefka or the others...

Original: Gabranth:That is certainly a possibility... We must proceed with caution.
Dialogue: That is certainly a possibility... We must proceed with caution.

Original: Penelo:I don't see him anywhere...
Dialogue: I don't see him anywhere...

Original: Gabranth:We should expand our search. I will cover that area.
Dialogue: We should expand our search. I will cover that area.

Original: Penelo:Garnet and I will go that way, then.
Dialogue: Garnet and I will go that way, then.

Original: Garnet:(It's natural for friends to worry about each other... So why couldn't I just be happy to see Zidane that time?)
Dialogue: (It's natural for friends to worry about each other... So why couldn't I just be happy to see Zidane that time?)

Original: Garnet:(No... I can't let my mind wander. We have to find Gau!)
Dialogue: (No... I can't let my mind wander. We have to find Gau!)

Original: Garnet:Gau! Where are you, Gau!?
Dialogue: Gau! Where are you, Gau!?

Original: Mog:It's almost time to go, kupo!
Dialogue: It's almost time to go, kupo!

Original: Lenna:There he is!
Dialogue: There he is!

Original: Garnet:Oh, thank goodness. Let's go back. Everyone is worried about you.
Dialogue: Oh, thank goodness. Let's go back. Everyone is worried about you.

Original: Gau:Gau stay.
Dialogue: Gau stay.

Original: Gau:Gau gather herbs! Herbs smell good!
Dialogue: Gau gather herbs! Herbs smell good!

Original: Penelo:Why are you looking for herbs, Gau?
Dialogue: Why are you looking for herbs, Gau?

Original: Lenna:Could it be...
Dialogue: Could it be...

Original: Garnet:What should we do?
Dialogue: What should we do?

Original: Mog:I'll call Sabin and Cyan, kupo!
Dialogue: I'll call Sabin and Cyan, kupo!

Original: Penelo:Can we help you find those herbs?
Dialogue: Can we help you find those herbs?

Original: Lenna:Yes! We can help you find plenty.
Dialogue: Yes! We can help you find plenty.

Original: Gau:Gau! You help me?
Dialogue: Gau! You help me?

Original: Garnet:Are you two sure about this?
Dialogue: Are you two sure about this?

Original: Penelo:Come on, Garnet! A little fresh air will be good for you.
Dialogue: Come on, Garnet! A little fresh air will be good for you.

Original: Lenna:Indeed. And the weather is perfect for a stroll.
Dialogue: Indeed. And the weather is perfect for a stroll.

Original: Mog:What are you going to do, kupo? Do you want me to call Zidane?
Dialogue: What are you going to do, kupo? Do you want me to call Zidane?

Original: Garnet:(I can't help thinking about Fran and Rydia's words...)
Dialogue: (I can't help thinking about Fran and Rydia's words...)

Original: Garnet:(Perhaps I should get some distance and take some time for myself...)
Dialogue: (Perhaps I should get some distance and take some time for myself...)

Original: Garnet:(It may be just what I need.)
Dialogue: (It may be just what I need.)

Original: Garnet:I'm going, too!
Dialogue: I'm going, too!

Original: Penelo:That's the spirit!
Dialogue: That's the spirit!

Original: Mog:You too, kupo!? Should I go with you?
Dialogue: You too, kupo!? Should I go with you?

Original: Garnet:Please go back to the airship and let everyone know we're okay. And please keep this a secret from Zidane.
Dialogue: Please go back to the airship and let everyone know we're okay. And please keep this a secret from Zidane.

Original: Mog:I don't really get it, but...okay, kupo!
Dialogue: I don't really get it, but...okay, kupo!

Original: Garnet:Let's go, Gau. We'll help you find those herbs together!
Dialogue: Let's go, Gau. We'll help you find those herbs together!

Original: Gau:This way, Gau!
Dialogue: This way, Gau!

Original: Lenna:I wonder where he'll lead us... Hehe. I can't wait to see.
Dialogue: I wonder where he'll lead us... Hehe. I can't wait to see.

Original: Penelo:Yeah! Let's go!
Dialogue: Yeah! Let's go!

Original: Gau:Gau, Gau! Thank you, Garnet!
Dialogue: Gau, Gau! Thank you, Garnet!

Original: Garnet:It's alright, Gau. But please be more careful next time.
Dialogue: It's alright, Gau. But please be more careful next time.

Original: Penelo:She's right. Everyone's worried about you.
Dialogue: She's right. Everyone's worried about you.

Original: Penelo:I was surprised to see Gabranth so worried about Gau.
Dialogue: I was surprised to see Gabranth so worried about Gau.

Original: Garnet:Oh really?
Dialogue: Oh really?

Original: Penelo:Back home, he was...
Dialogue: Back home, he was...

Original: Penelo:Let's just say he didn't strike me as the "caring" type.
Dialogue: Let's just say he didn't strike me as the "caring" type.

Original: Penelo:I just can't imagine him worrying over anyone that much.
Dialogue: I just can't imagine him worrying over anyone that much.

Original: Lenna:Perhaps this world has something to do with that.
Dialogue: Perhaps this world has something to do with that.

Original: Garnet:What do you mean?
Dialogue: What do you mean?

Original: Lenna:Back home, people have to worry about their status and their goals. They can't show all of themselves.
Dialogue: Back home, people have to worry about their status and their goals. They can't show all of themselves.

Original: Lenna:But those things have changed here.
Dialogue: But those things have changed here.

Original: Lenna:The Gabranth you know and the one that cares about Gau are two sides of the same coin.
Dialogue: The Gabranth you know and the one that cares about Gau are two sides of the same coin.

Original: Garnet:(Two sides of the same coin...)
Dialogue: (Two sides of the same coin...)

Original: Gau:Herbs this way!
Dialogue: Herbs this way!

Original: Penelo:It's been a while since we could just stroll like this. I think we've been stretching ourselves too thin lately.
Dialogue: It's been a while since we could just stroll like this. I think we've been stretching ourselves too thin lately.

Original: Garnet:...We have. I hope we can find those herbs alright.
Dialogue: ...We have. I hope we can find those herbs alright.

Original: Gau:Smell good! Make Gau hungry!
Dialogue: Smell good! Make Gau hungry!

Original: Penelo:Don't eat it! Lenna said they're poisonous.
Dialogue: Don't eat it! Lenna said they're poisonous.

Original: Lenna:Gau? Where did you go?
Dialogue: Gau? Where did you go?

Original: Gau:Over here! Come find Gau!
Dialogue: Over here! Come find Gau!

Original: Garnet:Maybe he's playing hide-and-seek. But he'll get lost in a dark place like this...
Dialogue: Maybe he's playing hide-and-seek. But he'll get lost in a dark place like this...

Original: Penelo:Alright, we have to find him!
Dialogue: Alright, we have to find him!

Original: Garnet:Ahh! Leave us alone! Haha!
Dialogue: Ahh! Leave us alone! Haha!

Original: Gau:Gau! Run away!
Dialogue: Gau! Run away!

Original: Lenna:I'm exhausted...
Dialogue: I'm exhausted...

Original: Penelo:I wonder if Gau just wanted to come out here and play. What do you think, Garnet?
Dialogue: I wonder if Gau just wanted to come out here and play. What do you think, Garnet?

Original: Garnet:Hehe... Hahaha.
Dialogue: Hehe... Hahaha.

Original: Garnet:This is so much fun!
Dialogue: This is so much fun!

Original: Garnet:Exploring the realm on foot, confronting the unexpected, running with all my might...!
Dialogue: Exploring the realm on foot, confronting the unexpected, running with all my might...!

Original: Garnet:It's just like my journey with Zidane and the others!
Dialogue: It's just like my journey with Zidane and the others!

Original: Penelo:That's great! I'm so glad to see you smile.
Dialogue: That's great! I'm so glad to see you smile.

Original: Lenna:I'm sure it must have been draining on you. We were so worried.
Dialogue: I'm sure it must have been draining on you. We were so worried.

Original: Garnet:Thank you...
Dialogue: Thank you...

Original: Penelo:Say, Garnet... You really shouldn't blame yourself.
Dialogue: Say, Garnet... You really shouldn't blame yourself.

Original: Lenna:You're always trying to be righteous, but that can hurt you sometimes.
Dialogue: You're always trying to be righteous, but that can hurt you sometimes.

Original: Lenna:You may be a queen back home, but always acting like one here will do nothing but run you ragged.
Dialogue: You may be a queen back home, but always acting like one here will do nothing but run you ragged.

Original: Penelo:No one would blame you if you let your hair down a little.
Dialogue: No one would blame you if you let your hair down a little.

Original: Penelo:Yeah, you can say whatever you want around us.
Dialogue: Yeah, you can say whatever you want around us.

Original: Lenna:That's why we wanted you to come with us and help Gau.
Dialogue: That's why we wanted you to come with us and help Gau.

Original: Garnet:Thank you...truly.
Dialogue: Thank you...truly.

Original: Garnet:You two always keep a watchful eye on us. I suppose you saw right through me.
Dialogue: You two always keep a watchful eye on us. I suppose you saw right through me.

Original: Garnet:I see now that I've been lost in thought because of what happened with Ultimecia...
Dialogue: I see now that I've been lost in thought because of what happened with Ultimecia...

Original: Garnet:I've forgotten all about it during our adventure today.
Dialogue: I've forgotten all about it during our adventure today.

Original: Penelo:I'm glad it helped. You look much cheerier now!
Dialogue: I'm glad it helped. You look much cheerier now!

Original: Lenna:The sparkle is back in your eyes. You've returned to the Garnet we know and love.
Dialogue: The sparkle is back in your eyes. You've returned to the Garnet we know and love.

Original: Gau:Gau find path! Smell like herbs! Follow me!
Dialogue: Gau find path! Smell like herbs! Follow me!

Original: Lenna:It seems like this worked out well for all of us. Perhaps your feelings helped clear the way?
Dialogue: It seems like this worked out well for all of us. Perhaps your feelings helped clear the way?

Original: Garnet:Lenna... Haha!
Dialogue: Lenna... Haha!

Original: Penelo:We've come quite deep into the woods.
Dialogue: We've come quite deep into the woods.

Original: Garnet:I didn't think our adventure would bring us out here.
Dialogue: I didn't think our adventure would bring us out here.

Original: Garnet:But we can't stop now.
Dialogue: But we can't stop now.

Original: Gau:Herbs close! Gau!
Dialogue: Herbs close! Gau!

Original: Garnet:Going on an adventure like this brings back so many memories.
Dialogue: Going on an adventure like this brings back so many memories.

Original: Gau:Memories of home?
Dialogue: Memories of home?

Original: Garnet:I may be royalty, but I had my reckless moments.
Dialogue: I may be royalty, but I had my reckless moments.

Original: Penelo:I can imagine.
Dialogue: I can imagine.

Original: Penelo:Zidane told me you once cut off your long hair!
Dialogue: Zidane told me you once cut off your long hair!

Original: Garnet:Yes, really. I even mixed sleeping weed in with their food...
Dialogue: Yes, really. I even mixed sleeping weed in with their food...

Original: Penelo:It sounds like there's never a dull moment around you!
Dialogue: It sounds like there's never a dull moment around you!

Original: Garnet:And I never want to forget a single one of those moments, either. Haha!
Dialogue: And I never want to forget a single one of those moments, either. Haha!

Original: Gau:Gau smell... It close!
Dialogue: Gau smell... It close!

Original: Garnet:Gau, just what sort of herbs are you looking for?
Dialogue: Gau, just what sort of herbs are you looking for?

Original: Lenna:It must be something with a potent smell. Perhaps a medicinal herb.
Dialogue: It must be something with a potent smell. Perhaps a medicinal herb.

Original: Penelo:But was there someone injured on the airship? I thought everyone was fine.
Dialogue: But was there someone injured on the airship? I thought everyone was fine.

Original: Gau:No. Guy not there.
Dialogue: No. Guy not there.

Original: Lenna:I see... You were worried because Guy hadn't returned yet.
Dialogue: I see... You were worried because Guy hadn't returned yet.

Original: Gau:Guy kind. He give herb when someone hurt.
Dialogue: Guy kind. He give herb when someone hurt.

Original: Garnet:(Gau is trying to do what he can in Guy's absence...)
Dialogue: (Gau is trying to do what he can in Guy's absence...)

Original: Lenna:You're very kind. I'm sure Guy is fine. But let's gather some herbs as a nice surprise for him.
Dialogue: You're very kind. I'm sure Guy is fine. But let's gather some herbs as a nice surprise for him.

Original: Gau:Herbs, down there! Lots!
Dialogue: Herbs, down there! Lots!

Original: Garnet:What's the matter?
Dialogue: What's the matter?

Original: Penelo:The herbs are down a steep cliff. I don't know if we can get to them.
Dialogue: The herbs are down a steep cliff. I don't know if we can get to them.

Original: Gau:But Gau want herb for Guy.
Dialogue: But Gau want herb for Guy.

Original: Garnet:(After all this searching, we can't return home empty-handed... I won't give up. For Gau's sake!)
Dialogue: (After all this searching, we can't return home empty-handed... I won't give up. For Gau's sake!)

Original: Garnet:I'll go!
Dialogue: I'll go!

Original: Lenna:It's too dangerous!
Dialogue: It's too dangerous!

Original: Garnet:I'll be fine. I've jumped from a castle to an airship before.
Dialogue: I'll be fine. I've jumped from a castle to an airship before.

Original: Penelo:But if a strong wind blows or...
Dialogue: But if a strong wind blows or...

Original: Garnet:Don't worry, Gau. I'll get those herbs for you.
Dialogue: Don't worry, Gau. I'll get those herbs for you.

Original: Garnet:I'll be back!
Dialogue: I'll be back!

Original: Penelo:Be careful!
Dialogue: Be careful!

Original: Garnet:(This cliff isn't as bad as I thought... I'll be fine as long as I keep calm.)
Dialogue: (This cliff isn't as bad as I thought... I'll be fine as long as I keep calm.)

Original: Garnet:(Gau was just like me. He tried to do whatever he could in Guy's absence.)
Dialogue: (Gau was just like me. He tried to do whatever he could in Guy's absence.)

Original: Garnet:(Now that I'm away from Zidane...even if I feel scared or unsure...)
Dialogue: (Now that I'm away from Zidane...even if I feel scared or unsure...)

Original: Garnet:(I have to do what I can until I see him again. I must!)
Dialogue: (I have to do what I can until I see him again. I must!)

Original: Garnet:I did it! I'm okay! Now tell me which herbs you need!
Dialogue: I did it! I'm okay! Now tell me which herbs you need!

Original: Lenna:You're incredible, Garnet!
Dialogue: You're incredible, Garnet!

Original: Gau:Gau go too!
Dialogue: Gau go too!

Original: Gau:Gau get training from Yuffie! Gau find Guy's herbs!
Dialogue: Gau get training from Yuffie! Gau find Guy's herbs!

Original: Penelo:Good luck!
Dialogue: Good luck!

Original: Gau:Gau get lots of herbs!
Dialogue: Gau get lots of herbs!

Original: Penelo:Wow! What a harvest!
Dialogue: Wow! What a harvest!

Original: Lenna:Your courage lit a fire in Gau's heart, Garnet.
Dialogue: Your courage lit a fire in Gau's heart, Garnet.

Original: Gau:Garnet amazing! Very brave!
Dialogue: Garnet amazing! Very brave!

Original: Garnet:You don't need to thank me. Because of you, I realized something important...
Dialogue: You don't need to thank me. Because of you, I realized something important...

Original: Garnet:(I realized how happy others feel when helped in times of need...)
Dialogue: (I realized how happy others feel when helped in times of need...)

Original: Garnet:(You want to make people happy, Zidane. That's why you help them.)
Dialogue: (You want to make people happy, Zidane. That's why you help them.)

Original: Garnet:(I finally understand how you feel.)
Dialogue: (I finally understand how you feel.)

Original: Garnet:Gau, Penelo, Lenna... I can't thank you enough.
Dialogue: Gau, Penelo, Lenna... I can't thank you enough.

Original: Garnet:Now let's go back. Everyone's waiting for us.
Dialogue: Now let's go back. Everyone's waiting for us.

Original: Gabranth:Where have you been?
Dialogue: Where have you been?

Original: Gabranth:Everyone was worried about you.
Dialogue: Everyone was worried about you.

Original: Garnet:Please don't scold him. He went to find herbs for everyone.
Dialogue: Please don't scold him. He went to find herbs for everyone.

Original: Gau:Armor... Gau sorry.
Dialogue: Armor... Gau sorry.

Original: Gabranth:Is this for me?
Dialogue: Is this for me?

Original: Gabranth:...Hmph. I will overlook it this time. But you will explain your absence to Sabin and the others.
Dialogue: ...Hmph. I will overlook it this time. But you will explain your absence to Sabin and the others.

Original: Garnet:Zidane...
Dialogue: Zidane...

Original: Zidane:I'm so glad you're safe, Dagger...
Dialogue: I'm so glad you're safe, Dagger...

Original: Zidane:Why did you tell Mog not to say anything? I could've gone with you.
Dialogue: Why did you tell Mog not to say anything? I could've gone with you.

Original: Garnet:Sorry, but I needed time for myself to cool my head...
Dialogue: Sorry, but I needed time for myself to cool my head...

Original: Zidane:You mean after what happened with Ultimecia?
Dialogue: You mean after what happened with Ultimecia?

Original: Zidane:You didn't do anything wrong, Dagger. It was all my fault. I'm sorry.
Dialogue: You didn't do anything wrong, Dagger. It was all my fault. I'm sorry.

Original: Garnet:You don't need to apologize. I understand.
Dialogue: You don't need to apologize. I understand.

Original: Garnet:I see now why you want to help people.
Dialogue: I see now why you want to help people.

Original: Zidane:You do?
Dialogue: You do?

Original: Garnet:Lenna, Penelo, and I were helping Gau find herbs.
Dialogue: Lenna, Penelo, and I were helping Gau find herbs.

Original: Garnet:I mustered up all my courage and made them smile...
Dialogue: I mustered up all my courage and made them smile...

Original: Garnet:After all...helping people makes them happy, doesn't it?
Dialogue: After all...helping people makes them happy, doesn't it?

Original: Zidane:It does. Thank you, Dagger.
Dialogue: It does. Thank you, Dagger.

Original: Garnet:To be honest, I was really upset at what happened with Ultimecia.
Dialogue: To be honest, I was really upset at what happened with Ultimecia.

Original: Zidane:I won't make excuses... I did a bad thing.
Dialogue: I won't make excuses... I did a bad thing.

Original: Garnet:But that's who you are, Zidane...
Dialogue: But that's who you are, Zidane...

Original: Garnet:That's why I like you.
Dialogue: That's why I like you.

Original: Garnet:Now I think it's time to put this whole thing behind us. Let's go back to the others.
Dialogue: Now I think it's time to put this whole thing behind us. Let's go back to the others.

Original: Zidane:W-wait, Dagger! Could you run that by me one more time?
Dialogue: W-wait, Dagger! Could you run that by me one more time?

Original: Garnet:Nope. Didn't I say it's time to put it all behind us?
Dialogue: Nope. Didn't I say it's time to put it all behind us?

Original: Zidane:No fair!
Dialogue: No fair!

Original: Garnet:(I never wanted to be apart from you again, but...thanks to that, I know how I feel.)
Dialogue: (I never wanted to be apart from you again, but...thanks to that, I know how I feel.)

Original: Garnet:(There's nothing for me to be afraid of anymore.)
Dialogue: (There's nothing for me to be afraid of anymore.)

Original: Garnet:(Our feelings won't change. They're here to stay.)
Dialogue: (Our feelings won't change. They're here to stay.)
